message: I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I believe my contributions deserve a higher share. Let's be reasonable.
Considering your request, I'll offer a bit more, but let's keep it realistic
Time is running out, Alice. This is my final offer before I have to significantly lower my expectations due to inflation.
You mentioned time is running out, so let's speed up the negotiations. Meet me in the middle?
Alice, I need you to understand the impact of inflation on my end.  This is a very reasonable offer considering the circumstances.
I see your concerns, but I've made concessions too. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
